page.title: 06The Lakeside Club Restaurant
page.content: Many show business stars from all over the world come and perform at {Lakeside.}Important guests have been members of the Royal Family, Prime Ministers and other notables. It is hoped that one day The Queen and The Princess of Wales will visit. Audiences come from far afield but the majority are local residents. Facilities cater for up to 1300 guests. There are approximately 30 staff with 250 call-in staff being employed for special occasions. The evening menu consists of seven main courses. The Sunday lunch is traditional and available for families. The average cost of a meal is Â£9, with wine and entertainment the cost could be Â£20. Future plans include hotel extension and boat trips on the{Basingstoke {Canal}to attract more tourists.
